ocean.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of the very large areas of sea on the Earth’s surface
ocean.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: GRAMMAR: Patterns with ocean
ocean.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0: You use in the ocean to talk about things that happen in the water
There are thousands of species of fish in the ocean
ocean.translation[0].note_box[0].items[1: You use on the ocean to talk about things that happen on the surface of the water
He dreamed of buying a yacht and sailing on the ocean
ocean.translation[0].note_box[0].items[2: You use by the ocean to talk about the area near the ocean
I’d love to live by the ocean
